name: TOP TANK
description:
TOP TANK

you will become the top tank

it isn't easy but you will do it

i believe in you



this took about a week to make. It's an endless scroller type arcade game. its fun & you should play it. the genre would be arcade but itch.io decided that isn't a genre


Z shoots, left/right arrows move, down arrow crouches/jumps

R restarts and 1,2,3,4 change window size

made for gbjam

Cool music by Eynx (http://www.soundcloud.com/eynx)

the other stuff by me (http://bn05.tumblr.com)
